crud.jsonrpc: SELECT ALERT_Q_ID "alertqid",ALERT_TYPE "alerttype",USER_ID "userid",SMS_TEXT "smstext",EMAIL_TEXT "emailtext",TO_CHAR(CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss')||'.0' "createtime",TO_CHAR(SCHEDULED_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss')||'.0' "scheduledtime",DELIVERED_STATUS "deliveredstatus",RETRY_COUNT "retrycount",MOBILE_NO "mobileno",EMAIL_TO "emailto",EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID "emailtemplateid",BULK_EMAIL_MEMBER_NO "bulkemailmemberno" FROM ALERT_QUEUE select count('x') from ALERT_QUEUE

SELECT ALERT_Q_ID "alertqid",ALERT_TYPE "alerttype",USER_ID "userid",SMS_TEXT "smstext",EMAIL_TEXT "emailtext",TO_CHAR(CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss')||'.0' "createtime",TO_CHAR(SCHEDULED_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss')||'.0' "scheduledtime",DELIVERED_STATUS "deliveredstatus",RETRY_COUNT "retrycount",MOBILE_NO "mobileno",EMAIL_TO "emailto",EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID "emailtemplateid",BULK_EMAIL_MEMBER_NO "bulkemailmemberno" FROM ALERT_QUEUE select count('x') from ALERT_QUEUE
crud.sqlinsert: insert into ALERT_QUEUE( ALERT_Q_ID, ALERT_TYPE, USER_ID, SMS_TEXT, EMAIL_TEXT, CREATE_TIME, SCHEDULED_TIME, DELIVERED_STATUS, RETRY_COUNT, MOBILE_NO, EMAIL_TO, EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID, BULK_EMAIL_MEMBER_NO) values ( #inp.form1[0].ALERT_Q_ID, #inp.form1[0].ALERT_TYPE, #inp.form1[0].USER_ID, #inp.form1[0].SMS_TEXT, #inp.form1[0].EMAIL_TEXT, #inp.form1[0].CREATE_TIME, #inp.form1[0].SCHEDULED_TIME, #inp.form1[0].DELIVERED_STATUS, #inp.form1[0].RETRY_COUNT, #inp.form1[0].MOBILE_NO, #inp.form1[0].EMAIL_TO, #inp.form1[0].EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID, #inp.form1[0].BULK_EMAIL_MEMBER_NO )

insert into ALERT_QUEUE( ALERT_Q_ID, ALERT_TYPE, USER_ID, SMS_TEXT, EMAIL_TEXT, CREATE_TIME, SCHEDULED_TIME, DELIVERED_STATUS, RETRY_COUNT, MOBILE_NO, EMAIL_TO, EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID, BULK_EMAIL_MEMBER_NO) values ( #inp.form1[0].ALERT_Q_ID, #inp.form1[0].ALERT_TYPE, #inp.form1[0].USER_ID, #inp.form1[0].SMS_TEXT, #inp.form1[0].EMAIL_TEXT, #inp.form1[0].CREATE_TIME, #inp.form1[0].SCHEDULED_TIME, #inp.form1[0].DELIVERED_STATUS, #inp.form1[0].RETRY_COUNT, #inp.form1[0].MOBILE_NO, #inp.form1[0].EMAIL_TO, #inp.form1[0].EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID, #inp.form1[0].BULK_EMAIL_MEMBER_NO )
crud.sqlupdate: update ALERT_QUEUE set ALERT_TYPE = #inp.form1[0].ALERT_TYPE, USER_ID = #inp.form1[0].USER_ID, SMS_TEXT = #inp.form1[0].SMS_TEXT, EMAIL_TEXT = #inp.form1[0].EMAIL_TEXT, CREATE_TIME = #inp.form1[0].CREATE_TIME, SCHEDULED_TIME = #inp.form1[0].SCHEDULED_TIME, DELIVERED_STATUS = #inp.form1[0].DELIVERED_STATUS, RETRY_COUNT = #inp.form1[0].RETRY_COUNT, MOBILE_NO = #inp.form1[0].MOBILE_NO, EMAIL_TO = #inp.form1[0].EMAIL_TO, EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID = #inp.form1[0].EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID, BULK_EMAIL_MEMBER_NO = #inp.form1[0].BULK_EMAIL_MEMBER_NO WHERE ALERT_Q_ID=#inp.form1[0].ALERT_Q_ID

update ALERT_QUEUE set ALERT_TYPE = #inp.form1[0].ALERT_TYPE, USER_ID = #inp.form1[0].USER_ID, SMS_TEXT = #inp.form1[0].SMS_TEXT, EMAIL_TEXT = #inp.form1[0].EMAIL_TEXT, CREATE_TIME = #inp.form1[0].CREATE_TIME, SCHEDULED_TIME = #inp.form1[0].SCHEDULED_TIME, DELIVERED_STATUS = #inp.form1[0].DELIVERED_STATUS, RETRY_COUNT = #inp.form1[0].RETRY_COUNT, MOBILE_NO = #inp.form1[0].MOBILE_NO, EMAIL_TO = #inp.form1[0].EMAIL_TO, EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID = #inp.form1[0].EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID, BULK_EMAIL_MEMBER_NO = #inp.form1[0].BULK_EMAIL_MEMBER_NO WHERE ALERT_Q_ID=#inp.form1[0].id|STRING
